aboutmespeak:
Hello, my name is Jason, and from a very young age I’ve been interested in computer science. Like many kids my age, I dreamed of creating video games. Later on, I became interested in graphic design and illustration, and today I’m teaching myself how to code. I want to take this learning further in a professional way and build a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

My hobbies often revolve around 2D/3D animation, board games, and art. I never run out of imagination!

I’m a beginner, but highly motivated. I want to turn this passion into a career by building on my current skills, constantly improving them, and contributing to exciting projects as part of a dynamic team.

This interactive and responsive resume was created after my professional training at Numérica. I worked on it a little every day during my diploma course. I hope you enjoy reading it.

Best regards,

Jason Haudot
